description: Chinese Astilbe (Astilbe chinensis 'Visions') is an amazing perennial flower that blooms from summer to early fall in breathtaking colors of pink, white, and rose. Their delicate blooms are sure to brighten up any garden and make it a stand out feature. It can even tolerate light shade, making it a versatile choice for any landscape. Plus, itâ€™s known for thriving in cold areas and being drought tolerant. Chinese Astilbe is a must-have for its incredibly long bloom time, magnificent colors, and easy care.
